column5: Silvio just wanted to wish you good luck with you're surgery today.  I know you're really apprehensive about it.. No worries once it is done you'll be much better off.  One word of advice.. REST and don't over do it. You have the rest of you're life to fish, Now is the time to heal.  Good Luck brother, we'll be thinking of ya.  G
Yep...I echo Gerritt's sentiments!  Take it easy Silvio....your body will thank you 20 years from now!!!!  Good luck!
good luck man.. i'll save a spot in the injured reserved section for ya..   very true gerritt.. its taken me 3 weeks to come to grips with that statement..
not bad.. hopefully they let me start moving it tomorrow.. the hardest thing is not drinking while on the meds.. thankfully that will come to an end on sunday..
BEER!!  They have you on the Oxycontin's?  G
i took em the day after surgery (got lots left  ), that was all i could stomach.. some other anti-inflammatory  to prevent bone forming in my elbow..
